DOC.brief_summary: To recruit patients who implanted with Perimount Heart Valve (Type Number: 6900PTFX or 2800TFX) from three hospitals in China. To track the patients'situations during one year after surgery and to collect the relevant clinical data.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Performance of Perimount Heart Valve in Chinese Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients implanted with Perimount 6900PTFX after 20121119 or with Perimount 2800TFX after 2013820 Patients sign the Inform Consent Form (ICF) and agree to join the study Don't have any specific exclusion criteria.
